description: Bring these 6 Piece Dining Table Mats from the House of Revexo. We bring Stylish Products for every women who dream to make their Home Unique & Beautiful. Excellent heat resistant placemats protects the dinner table from direct contact with hot utensils and prevents scratches, spills, stains. Perfect for everyday casual dining, parties and special occasions, they will impress their guests with their simple and elegant design. Easy to roll, store, wipe and clean, they make your dining a pleasant experience. These are the Antislip Mats and help to keep the Cup and Plates in Place.
